entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
